description:
Elegant and easygoing, this wrap dress has a flattering cut and (most importantly) pockets. A go-to style for everything from running errands to impromptu weekends away.Silky organic cotton, Tencel blend fabric.Slight slub texture adds dimension.Wrap style with waist tie.On-seam hand pockets store small essentials.

        Sustainability

name: Toad &Co Cue Wrap Short Sleeve Dress - Women's
